channel.title: Projects on Portfolio website for Linda Wu
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Portfolio website for Linda Wu

item.title: Stock Portfolio
item.description: ``` R Markdown My Portfolio I am an investor in China A-share stock market. Here is my portfolio consisting of seven stocks diversifying in industries. myStocks <- c("600519.SS", "601398.SS", "601318.SS", "601857.SS", "603288.SS", "600276.SS","600048.SS","000001.SS" ) %>% tq_get(get = "stock.prices", from = "2018-01-01", to = "2020-10-14") %>% group_by(symbol) glimpse(myStocks) ## Rows: 4,026 ## Columns: 8 ## Groups: symbol [6] ## $ symbol <chr> "601318.SS", "601318.SS", "601318.SS", "601318.SS", "601318… ## $ date <date> 2018-01-02, 2018-01-03, 2018-01-04, 2018-01-05, 2018-01-08… ## $ open <dbl> 70.
